title: Levy C Curve
description: An interactive MicroSim demonstrating the Levy C curve fractal with adjustable recursion depth and size controls.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Mathematics
Geometry
Fractals
learningObjectives: Understand how simple geometric rules create complex fractal patterns
Compare and contrast different fractal construction methods
Observe the relationship between recursion depth and visual complexity
Explore the concept of fractal dimension through visual observation

controls.name: recursionSlider
controls.label: Recursion Level
controls.description: Controls the depth of fractal recursion. Higher values create more detailed curves.

controls.name: sizeSlider
controls.label: Size
controls.description: Adjusts the overall size of the curve within the canvas.

equations: Number of segments at level n: S(n) = 2^(n-1)
limitations: Maximum recursion level of 16 to prevent performance issues
